document.full_text: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords was scheduled to undergo a cranioplasty in houston on wednesday, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, according to a report in the houston chronicle.
document.title: gabrielle giffords to undergo cranioplasty in houston: report
lines_and_colors: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords was scheduled to undergo a cranioplasty in houston on wednesday, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, according to a report in the houston chronicle.
